name: Grim Rift
description:
A quick little prototype made for the GDL 2022 game jam!

NOTE: Web build appears to have broken D:

Description: In a grim, futuristic world with parallel universes and rifts to travel between them, you must solve puzzles that inevitably require your death!

Developer Note: I was only able to put in about half a day's worth of development into this but I'm actually incredibly pleased with how it plays. That being said though, the game is just one level that showcases the mechanics I had time to implement - no sounds or progression but a little bit of visual polish.

Controls:

ActionKeyboard / MouseControllerMovementWASDLeft StickJumpSpaceAInteract / Pickup / PlaceE / LMBXThrowQ / RMBBMove Rift (hold to reset)RY
